item.title: Home
item.content:encoded:
UnoSlick responsive one page website.

Create a compelling landing page with GeneratePress and Elementor. Just import, edit and publish. Click here Or Click here https://vimeo.com/284435499

Canvas the GP way with the Layout Element

This site uses the GP Layout Element to create a blank Canvas. You'll find it Appearance > Elements.

GeneratePress Theme control

Typography

Theme control of fonts, font sizes and colors.

Navigation

Responsive Theme Navigation out of the box. No fussing with hidden elements or pop-ups with this baby.

Elements

Game changing Elements module provides powerful ways to change layouts, hook scripts and create beautiful dynamic page heroes. https://vimeo.com/140129911

Built with Elementor Free and Custom CSS

https://vimeo.com/140129911

Shorter Animations

Lifes too short for Elementors long animations. So we tweaked the fadeUpIn animation and the float button animation. 

Button Shadow

Button shadows are great but their either on or off. A little bit of CSS removes the shadow when the buttons aren't hovered. Nice.

Perspective Columns

Add some perspective to your columns. Give the column a class of left-perspective or right-perspective.

Add Your Heading Text Here

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

Want to know more?

Click here

Mobile mockup

We created a custom Mobile Phone container to show case your content. Hover over and scroll to see the full effect. Important - read Me The fake mobile phone is built using an Elemntor column with a background color, border radius and some percentage padding. Do not adjust any of these settings or add margins or other styles aside from the colors maybe. The rest of this is created using a little CSS and changing settings in Elementor may break this look. Create your own mockup Simply edit the Image Widget in the Column to the left and replace it with your own image and select Image size: Full. Making your own screen shot
  • Open your chosen website in Chrome
  • Open the Dev Tools with Right Click > Inspect
  • Select the Responsive view ( mobile icon)
  • Set Responsive view to iPhone X (375px wide)
  • Select the Dev Tools Window and press: CTRL + SHIFT + P (WIN) or CMD + SHIFT + P (MAC)
  • In the field provided type FULL SCREEN CAPTURE
  • Hit return and your image is downloaded
  • Optimize your image using your favorite app

Start your site today

Click here Click here

We created a custom Mobile Phone container to show case your content. Hover over and scroll to see the full effect.<\/p>","_margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":true},"align_mobile":"center","_animation":"fadeIn","_animation_delay":100},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"f20bd52","elType":"widget","settings":{"tabs":[{"tab_title":"Important - read Me","tab_content":"

The fake mobile phone is built using an Elemntor column with a background color, border radius and some percentage padding. Do not adjust any of these settings or add margins or other styles aside from the colors maybe.<\/p>

The rest of this is created using a little CSS and changing settings in Elementor may break this look.<\/p>","_id":"0408e7c"},{"tab_title":"Create your own mockup","tab_content":"

Simply edit the Image Widget in the Column to the left and replace it with your own image and select Image size: Full.<\/p>","_id":"d393e99"},{"tab_title":"Making your own screen shot","tab_content":"

  • Open your chosen website in Chrome<\/li>
  • Open the Dev Tools with Right Click > Inspect<\/li>
  • Select the Responsive view ( mobile icon)<\/li>
  • Set Responsive view to iPhone X (375px wide)<\/li>
  • Select the Dev Tools Window and press: CTRL + SHIFT + P (WIN) or CMD + SHIFT + P (MAC)<\/li>
  • In the field provided type FULL SCREEN CAPTURE<\/li>
  • Hit return and your image is downloaded<\/li>
  • Optimize your image using your favorite
